derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from a variant of medieval Latin rapuncium; compare with German Rapunzel 'lamb's lettuce'

means.word_mean: 1. bellflower of Europe and Asia and North Africa having bluish flowers and an edible tuberous root used with the leaves in salad

auth_sentence.content: The proposed Rampion offshore wind farm would be visible from the national park and resorts including Brighton.
